Definition: Absolute path to directory that contains the data files including the schema. Can be :code:`null` if schema is supplied to :py:class:`citylearn.citylearn.CityLearnEnv` constructor as a filepath.
Set to :code:`true` for centralized control architecture  else :code:`false`.
Time step in the data files to start the simulation from.
Time step in the data files to end the simulation at.
Either the number of time steps in an episode or list of episode start and end time steps between :code:`simulation_start_time_step` and :code:`simulation_end_time_step`
True if episode sequences are split such that each time step is a candidate for `episode_start_time_step` otherwise, False to split episodes in steps of `episode_time_steps`
True if episode splits are to be selected at random during training otherwise, False to select sequentially.
Used to define the time resolution of the data files.
Used to define the observation space.
Set to :code:`true` if named :code:`<observation>` should be added to the observation space and provided to the agent  else :code:`false`.
Set to :code:`true` if if named :code:`<observation>` values will be common in all buildings.
Used to define the action space.
Set to :code:`true` if agent will provide named :code:`<action>` to environment.
Used tp define control algorithm to use in simulation.
Control algorithm class in :py:mod:`citylearn.agents` or user-defined algorithm class path.
Used to define attributes/hyperparameters that are used to construct control algorithm class specified in :code:`agent:type`.
Value to set named :code:`<attribute>` to in control algorithm.
Used to define reward function to use in simulation.
Reward function class in :py:mod:`citylearn.reward_function` or user-defined reward function class path.
Used to define attributes/hyperparameters that are used to construct reward function class specified in :code:`reward_function:type`.
Value to set named :code:`<attribute>` to in reward function.
Used tp define buildings to use in simulation.
Used to define the attributes of a building uniquely named :code:`<building_name>`.
Set to :code:`true` if :code:`<building_name>` should be included in simulation.
Filename of building data file for :code:`<building_name>`. This file must be located in :code:`root_directory`.
Filename of weather data file for :code:`<building_name>`. This file must be located in :code:`root_directory`.
Filename of carbon intensity data file for :code:`<building_name>`. This file must be located in :code:`root_directory`.
Filename of electricity pricing data file for :code:`<building_name>`. This file must be located in :code:`root_directory`.
:code:`<building_name>` class in :py:mod:`citylearn.building` or user-defined building class path.
List of building-specific inactive observations that overrides :code:`observations:<observation>:active`.
List of building-specific inactive actions that overrides :code:`actions:<action>:active`.

Used to define a <device> for :code:`<building_name>`. :code:`<device>` can be :code:`cooling_device`, :code:`heating_device`, :code:`dhw_device`, :code:`cooling_storage`, :code:`heating_storage`, :code:`dhw_storage`, :code:`electrical_storage` or :code:`pv`.
:code:`<device>` class in :py:mod:`citylearn.energy_model` or user-defined device class path.
Set to :code:`true` if the :code:`<device>` should be autosized for :code:`<building_name>` else :code:`false`.
Used to define attributes that are used to autosize :code:`<device>` class specified in :code:`buildings:<building_name>:<device>:type`.
Value to set named :code:`<attribute>` to autosize :code:`<device>` class specified in :code:`buildings:<building_name>:<device>:type`.
Used to define attributes that are used to construct :code:`<device>` class specified in :code:`buildings:<building_name>:<device>:type`.
Value to set named :code:`<attribute>` of :code:`<device>` class specified in :code:`buildings:<building_name>:<device>:type`.
Used to define building temperature dynamics LSTM models.
Used to define building temperature dynamics LSTM model for specific HVAC mode where :code:`<mode>` may be :code:`cooling` or :code:`heating`.
temperature dynamics class in :py:mod:`citylearn.dynamics` or user-defined dynamics class path.
Used to define attributes that are used to construct :code:`buildings:<building_name>:dynamics:<mode>:type`.
Used to define power outage preferences and stochastic model.
Whether to allow time steps when the grid is unavailable and loads must be met using only the building's flexible resources.
Whether to use a stochastic function to determine outage time steps otherwise, :py:class:`citylearn.building.Building.energy_simulation.power_outage` time series is used.
Used to define stochastic power outage model.
Stochastic power outage model in :py:mod:`citylearn.power_outage` or user-defined model class path.
Used to define attributes/hyperparameters that are used to construct stochastic power outage model class in :code:`buildings:<building_name>:power_outage:stochastic_power_outage_model:type`.
